subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: United States Coach Greg Ryan was fired on Monday, less than a month after his risky decision to start Briana Scurry in goal against Brazil led to the team’s exit in the Women’s World Cup.
snippet: United States Coach Greg Ryan was fired on Monday, less than a month after his risky decision to start Briana Scurry in goal against Brazil led to the team’s exit in the Women’s World Cup.
